response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our top-of-the-line product to you. This item is not just a purchase; it's an investment in excellence and efficiency. Given its unique features and unparalleled quality, I believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal life. Considering its value, I am offering it to you for $15,000. I trust this price reflects the product's true worth and offers you a fair opportunity to acquire it.
